welcome_message_body: Welcome to Boca Raton, where beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and upscale shopping await you. We're thrilled to have you here and hope you'll make the most of your time exploring all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Public Airport is responsible for all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, and is home to airlines such as Southwest and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, and is home to airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, and is home to airlines such as American and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights, and is home to airlines such as Air Canada and British Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal exclusively serves Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Beach County Park Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Palm Beach County Park Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
